title: San Juan National Historic Site: Join Our Friends
body: Join Our Friends       Friends of San Juan National Historic Site assists the National Park Service in its mission to preserve and protect the San Juan National Historic Site by raising funds and public awareness, and by providing volunteers for needed projects.   Preserve, restore and enhance the park's natural and cultural resources Provide improved services and facilities for its visitors Increase public awareness and support of the park Enhance educational and interpretive activities Improve trails and facilities. Preserve historic structures  Please help the Friends help the San Juan NHS. Become a Friend today! Friends of San Juan National Historic Site is an independent, 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. All donations are tax-deductible as allowable by law.
